name: KERA370BRE
commonTitle: 370 gal Melting Kettle with Electrically Heated Hose and Wand
lmDescp: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant without requiring any additional equipment!

descp.default: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant, not requiring any additional equipment!
descp.CrackSealing: Marathon's gravity pour kettle is equipped with an oil jacket that encases the material vat to ensure even heat distribution and insulate any hot rubber material. The melted rubber is dispensed into a material applicator such as a pouring cone or DF10W.  A 370-gallon kettle is ideal for high production crack filling operations.
descp.JointSealing: Marathon's electrically heated hose crack sealing applicator for effortlessly applying waterproofing sealant to roadways. This machine has been refined over the years to make it efficient and ergonomic for the contractor while reducing fatigue and increasing productivity. The KERA370BRE is an ideal size for large applications of joint sealing such as paving joints.

family: Oil Jacketed Melting Kettles With Heated Hose And Wand

name: KERA270BRE
commonTitle: 270 gal Melting Kettle with Electrically Heated Hose and Wand
lmDescp: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant without requiring any additional equipment!

descp.default: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant, not requiring any additional equipment!
descp.CrackSealing: This asphalt crack sealing kettle uses an electrically heated hose for effortlessly and quickly applying crack sealant to roadways. The oil jacket surrounding the material vat ensures fast and even heating through the material. The 270-gallon material vat is ideal for municipal roads and highway crack sealing jobs.
descp.JointSealing: Marathon's electrically heated hose crack sealing applicator for effortlessly applying waterproofing sealant to roadways. This machine has been refined over the years to make it efficient and ergonomic for the contractor while reducing fatigue and increasing productivity. The KERA270BRE is an ideal size for all applications of joint sealing such as paving joints, bridge joints and patching joints.

lmDescp: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant without requiring any additional equipment!

descp.default: Marathon's KERA models are designed for high production crack filling of hot poured rubberized crack sealants. These diesel fired kettles feature an electrically heated hose delivery system that is capable of heating, melting and applying rubberized crack sealant, not requiring any additional equipment!
descp.CrackSealing: This asphalt crack sealing kettle uses an electrically heated hose to melt and apply blacktop crack filler effortlessly. The oil jacket surrounding the material vat ensures fast and even heating through the material. The 180-gallon material vat is ideal for large parking lots and municipal crack sealing jobs.
descp.JointSealing: Marathon's electrically heated hose crack sealing applicator for effortlessly applying waterproofing sealant to roadways. This machine has been refined over the years to make it efficient and ergonomic for the contractor while reducing fatigue and increasing productivity. The KERA180BRE is an ideal size for both patch joints and bridge joints.
descp.Bridges: Marathon's industry leading electrically heated hose applicator for effortlessly applying crack sealant to roadways. This machine has been refined over the years to make it efficient and ergonomic for the contractor while reducing fatigue and increasing productivity. Commonly used for bridge repairs due to its fast and clean application of sealants.

name: UCMK370PT
lmDescp: Marathon's gravity fed asphalt melter kettles are capable of heating, melting and dispensing hot applied rubberized material for crack sealing, waterproofing, and roofing. Multiple sizes available from 130 gallon up to 370 gallon capacities.

descp.default: Marathon's gravity fed asphalt melter kettles are capable of heating, melting and dispensing hot applied rubberized material for crack sealing, waterproofing, and roofing. Multiple sizes available from 130 gallon up to 370 gallon capacities.
descp.CrackSealing: Marathon's entry level oil jacketed gravity poured dispensing kettle. The UCMK has an oil vat that wraps around the material vat to both insulate the material and reduce heat up times and ensure material is heated gently and evenly. The material is dispensed into an material applicator such as a pouring cone or DF10W. The 370-gallon material vat is an ideal size for asphalt crack sealing on roads and highways.
descp.JointSealing: Marathon's largest UCMK is designed to heat up large quantities of bituminous materials that are used to weatherproof and limit water from penetrating further into an asphalt surface that has a joint or seam. The UCMK line is the economical and simple solution for joint sealing as it does not have a pumping system like the KERA line.
descp.Foundations: Marathon's largest gravity pour kettle is equipped with an oil jacket that encases the material vat to ensure even heat distribution and insulate any bituminous waterproofing material. Typically, a bituminous coating material is melted in the UCMK to be applied before a waterproof membrane is applied.
descp.Roofing: Marathon's largest gravity pour kettle is equipped with an oil jacket that encases the material vat to ensure even heat distribution and insulate any bituminous waterproofing material. Typically, a bituminous coating material is melted in the UCMK to be applied before a waterproof membrane is applied.
descp.Bridges: Marathon's largest oil jacketed kettle is the UCMK370. This large tank reduces the amount of time waiting for material to melt. Reducing the heat up time is essential for applying a consistent layer of waterproof membrane.

descp.Bridges: The UCMK has an oil vat that wraps around the material vat to insulate the material and reduce heat up times and ensure material is heated gently and evenly. Commonly, Bonding bitumen is melted in the UCMK to be applied before a waterproof membrane is applied.

descp.Utilities: Mastic is a great alternative to more traditional Asphalt for cutouts. Mastic provides a waterproof membrane that unlike asphalt is pliable giving two different surfaces the ability to move and expand with the season and not compromising the surface of the repair.

descp.ResidentialConstruction: The UCMK is perfect for residential construction, the size makes it perfect navigating busy job sites. The single axle makes maneuvering the machine into tight spaces ...
